events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Software Engineering department for further processing.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps.
Your initial phone screening went well; the recruiter was impressed with your relevant experience.
Thank you for your prompt response to the screening feedback and your enthusiasm about the role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 16th at 2 PM UTC with our lead developer.
You successfully completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been arranged for May 20th to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went positively. We appreciated your questions about growth opportunities and work environment.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer role with competitive compensation.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer and for clarifying your expectations.
We are excited to confirm that you have accepted the offer and will be joining our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially started. Welcome aboard, and we look forward to your contributions.
The hiring process is now complete, and you are officially a member of our software engineering team.
